titles.title: Mǝʿǝraf, The Common of the Office / Dǝggwa, Antiphonary / Zǝmmare, Eucharistic hymns

shortcontents.shortcontent: I) Mǝʿǝraf, The Common of the Office (fols. 2ra-11vb) I-1) Sacerdotal prayers (fol. 2ra-rb) I-2) Wazema, The Office of Vigils (fols. 2rb-9ra) I-3) Sacerdotal prayers (fols. 9ra-10vb) - Table of halleluiatic chants (fols. 10vb-11vb) II) Dǝggwa, Antiphonary (for the entire year except the periods of Lent and Easter) (fols. 12ra-95vb), incomplete III) Zǝmmare, Eucharistic hymns (fols. 1r-1v, 95vb-97vb), incomplete.

dcomments.dcomment: King Täklä Haymanot (most probably Täklä Haymanot II, r. 1769-77) is mentioned in the supplication in fol. 9va.

txstates.txstate: The Ms. is destroyed, affected by water and incomplete. Both boards are missing. The sewing is damaged. A few fols. are missing before fol. 10; one fol. is missing in quire V between fols. 37 and 38, in quire VI between fols. 45 and 46; at least one fol. is missing before fol. 71; a few fols. are missing or are misplaced after fol. 82; fols. 90-92 are misplaced; fol. 1 is misplaced and should follow fol. 97. Fol. 26 is torn apart and crudely repaired. The outer edge of fol. 92 is damaged, with the loss of text.

bindings.binding: Both boards are missing. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bnothers.bnother: Small holes are visible in the centrefold of the quires, one close to the head and one close to the tail of the codex.

txfolios.txfolio: Two leaves were foliated with number 43. The picture of the second leaf was given number 43a.

squires.squire:
I(1; s.l.: 1, loose leaf/fol. 1r-1v) – II(10/fols. 2r-11v) – II(6/fols. 12r-17v) – III(10/fols. 18r-27v) – IV(10/fols. 28r-37v) – V(10-1; s.l.: 9, no stub/fols. 38r-45v) – VI(10-1; s.l.: 9, no stub/fols. 46r-54v) – VII(10; s.l.: 1, 2, 9, 10, loose leaves/fols. 55r-64v) – VIII(6/fols. 65r-70v) – IX(3; s.l.: 3, loose leaf/fols. 71r-73v) – X(8/fols. 74r-81v) – XI(2; s.l.: 1, 2, loose leaves/fols. 82r-83v) – XII(2; s.l.: 1, 2, loose leaves/fols. 82r-83v) – XI(6/fols. 84r-89v) – XII(6/fols. 84r-89v) – XIII(8; s.l.: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, loose leaves; 7-8 bifolio/fols. 90r-97v).
The structure of quires cannot be exactly determined, esp. from quire IX onwards, due to the poor condition of the Ms.

taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/B. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible (very close to the outer edges). The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

rulings.ruling: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/B. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible (very close to the outer edges). Structural pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

pchangeofhands.pchangeofhand: The quality of the handwriting slightly changes throughout the Ms. On fols. 12ra-81vb the letters are bigger than on fols. 2ra-11vb. From fol. 81vb to fol. 89vb the handwriting becomes uneven, the letters are crudely and carelessly written, right- and left-sloping as well as upright.

rubrications.rubrication: Nomina sacra; elements of the punctuation signs; elements of Ethiopic numerals. Text I: The incipit of Text I-1; initial words of prayers, antiphons and other chants (e.g., ʾǝgziʾo ṣäraḫku, fol. 2va); names of feasts and other occasions; elements of the Table of halleluiatic chants. Text II: Names of sections occasionally followed by feast names (e.g., wazema zä-Ṣǝyon); names of antiphons and their abbreviations (e.g., maḫlet, mäzmur, śäläst, sälam, bä-5-tu, ʾabun, ʾaryam, ʾǝsmä lä-ʿaläm, zä-ʾamlakiyä, zä-yǝʾǝze, yǝtbaräk); names of other chants and their abbreviations (e.g., mǝlṭan, mǝsbak, ʿǝzl); musical notation: intratextual signs (e.g., sǝräyu, qädami, yǝgäbbǝru, qalä ʿawadi, ʾaklilä, täsäfḥa) and elements of marginal signs. Text III: Names of sections (zǝmmare) followed by feast names.

abbreviations.abbreviation: ምል፡, ምልጣ: for ምልጣን፡ ማኅሌ፡ for ማኅሌት፡ መዝ፡, መዝሙ፡ for መዝሙር፡ ቃለ፡ for ቃለ፡ ዓዋዲ፡ እስመ፡ for እስመ፡ ለዓለም፡ ዕዝ፡ for ዕዝል፡ ይትባ፡ for ይትባረክ፡ ዘይእ፡ for ዘይእዜ፡ ስብ፡, ስብሐ፡ for ስብሐተ፡ ነግህ፡ ቅ፡ ሕ for ቅዱስ፡ ሕያው፡ (fol. 2ra)

extras.extra: - Tämälläs-signs, in the shape of a cross, indicating the place where the omissions written in the margins, in the main hand, belong: fols. 33va l.5, 42va l.12, 43va l.1, 44va l.8, 49ra l.4, 52va l.13, 56ra l.13, 57rb l.8, 92ra l.2. - Omissions are written interlineally and in the margins, in the main hand and in secondary hands: fols. 10rb, 26r, 28v, 40ra, 41rb, 43ava, 49ra, 52rb, 70vb, 74vb, 82r, 83rb, 85v, 86r, 94rb. - Immediate corrections indicated by thin lines above and below the word: fols. 4rb, 6rb, 41rb, 43ava, 44va. - Ornamented divider: fol. 95vb. - Scribbles: fols. 1r, 10r, 12r, 15v, 30v, 35v, 36v, 46r, 57r, 86r, 97rv.

frames.frame: Fol. 83rb: Short, uncoloured ornamental band; geometric motifs. Fol. 93rb: Short, uncoloured ornamental band; floral motifs, interlaces.
